article_title: Checkpoint attack follows surge in violence in the West Bank.
sentence: As  we  reported  earlier  ,  Israeli  police  say  they  killed  three  gunmen  who  opened  fire  on  the  checkpoint.

article_title: Checkpoint attack follows surge in violence in the West Bank.
sentence: The  UN  says  182  Palestinians,  including  46  children,  have  been  killed  by  Israeli  forces  since  7  October.
